articles.title: Australia's largest state reports first local coronavirus case in weeks - Devdiscourse
articles.description: Australia's largest state of New South Wales on Saturday reported its first locally transmitted COVID-19 case since late May, a sign the threat from the pandemic is far from over as social distancing restrictions continue to be eased.Australia has so far been…
